verses.verse: And it came<WH1961> to pass after<WH310> these<WH428> things,<WH1697> that one told<WH559> Joseph,<WH3130> Behold,<WH2009> your father<WH1> is sick:<WH2470> and he took<WH3947> with him his two<WH8147> sons,<WH1121> Manasseh<WH4519> and Ephraim.<WH669>

And one told<WH5046> Jacob,<WH3290> and said,<WH559> Behold,<WH2009> your son<WH1121> Joseph<WH3130> comes<WH935> to you: and Israel<WH3478> strengthened<WH2388> himself, and sat<WH3427> on the bed.<WH4296>
And Jacob<WH3290> said<WH559> to Joseph,<WH3130> God<WH410> Almighty<WH7706> appeared<WH7200> to me at Luz<WH3870> in the land<WH776> of Canaan,<WH3667> and blessed<WH1288> me,

And said<WH559> to me, Behold,<WH2005> I will make you fruitful,<WH6509> and multiply<WH7235> you, and I will make<WH5414> of you a multitude<WH6951> of people;<WH5971> and will give<WH5414> this<WH2063> land<WH776> to your seed<WH2233> after<WH310> you for an everlasting<WH5769> possession.<WH272>

And now<WH6258> your two<WH8147> sons,<WH1121> Ephraim<WH669> and Manasseh,<WH4519> which were born<WH3205> to you in the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714> before<WH5704> I came<WH935> to you into Egypt,<WH4714> are mine; as Reuben<WH7205> and Simeon,<WH8095> they shall be mine.

And your issue,<WH4138> which<WH834> you beget<WH3205> after<WH310> them, shall be yours, and shall be called<WH7121> after<WH5921> the name<WH8034> of their brothers<WH251> in their inheritance.<WH5159>

And as for me, when I came<WH935> from Padan,<WH6307> Rachel<WH7354> died<WH4191> by me in the land<WH776> of Canaan<WH3667> in the way,<WH1870> when<WH5750> yet<WH5750> there was but a little<WH3530> way<WH776> to come<WH935> to Ephrath:<WH672> and I buried<WH6912> her there<WH8033> in the way<WH1870> of Ephrath;<WH672> the same<WH1931> is Bethlehem.<WH1035>
And Israel<WH3478> beheld<WH7200> Joseph's<WH3130> sons,<WH1121> and said,<WH559> Who<WH4310> are these?<WH428>

And Joseph<WH3130> said<WH559> to his father,<WH1> They are my sons,<WH1121> whom<WH834> God<WH430> has given<WH5414> me in this<WH2088> place. And he said,<WH559> Bring<WH3947> them, I pray<WH4994> you, to me, and I will bless<WH1288> them.

Now the eyes<WH5869> of Israel<WH3478> were dim<WH3513> for age,<WH2207> so that he could<WH3201> not see.<WH7200> And he brought<WH5066> them near<WH5066> to him; and he kissed<WH5401> them, and embraced<WH2263> them.
And Israel<WH3478> said<WH559> to Joseph,<WH3130> I had not thought<WH6419> to see<WH7200> your face:<WH6440> and, see,<WH2009> God<WH430> has showed<WH7200> me also<WH1571> your seed.<WH2233>
And Joseph<WH3130> brought<WH3318> them out from between<WH5973> his knees,<WH1290> and he bowed<WH7812> himself with his face<WH639> to the earth.<WH776>

And Joseph<WH3130> took<WH3947> them both,<WH8147> Ephraim<WH669> in his right<WH3225> hand<WH3225> toward Israel's<WH3478> left<WH8040> hand,<WH8040> and Manasseh<WH4519> in his left<WH8040> hand<WH8040> toward Israel's<WH3478> right<WH3225> hand,<WH3225> and brought<WH5066> them near<WH5066> to him.

And Israel<WH3478> stretched<WH7971> out his right<WH3225> hand,<WH3225> and laid<WH7896> it on Ephraim's<WH669> head,<WH7218> who<WH1931> was the younger,<WH6810> and his left<WH8040> hand<WH8040> on Manasseh's<WH4519> head,<WH7218> guiding his hands<WH3027> wittingly;<WH7919> for Manasseh<WH4519> was the firstborn.<WH1060>

And he blessed<WH1288> Joseph,<WH3130> and said,<WH559> God,<WH430> before<WH6440> whom<WH834> my fathers<WH1> Abraham<WH85> and Isaac<WH3327> did walk,<WH1980> the God<WH430> which fed<WH7462> me all my life long<WH5750> to this<WH2088> day,<WH3117>

The Angel<WH4397> which redeemed<WH1350> me from all<WH3605> evil,<WH7451> bless<WH1288> the lads;<WH5288> and let my name<WH8034> be named<WH7121> on them, and the name<WH8034> of my fathers<WH1> Abraham<WH85> and Isaac;<WH3327> and let them grow<WH1711> into a multitude<WH7230> in the middle<WH7130> of the earth.<WH776>

And when Joseph<WH3130> saw<WH7200> that his father<WH1> laid<WH7896> his right<WH3225> hand<WH3027> on the head<WH7218> of Ephraim,<WH669> it displeased<WH7489> <WH5869> him: and he held<WH8551> up his father's<WH1> hand,<WH3027> to remove<WH5493> it from Ephraim's<WH669> head<WH7218> to Manasseh's<WH4519> head.<WH7218>
And Joseph<WH3130> said<WH559> to his father,<WH1> Not so,<WH3651> my father:<WH1> for this<WH2088> is the firstborn;<WH1060> put<WH7760> your right<WH3225> hand<WH3225> on his head.<WH7218>

And his father<WH1> refused,<WH3985> and said,<WH559> I know<WH3045> it, my son,<WH1121> I know<WH3045> it: he also<WH1571> shall become<WH1961> a people,<WH5971> and he also<WH1571> shall be great:<WH1431> but truly<WH199> his younger<WH6996> brother<WH251> shall be greater<WH1431> than he, and his seed<WH2233> shall become<WH1961> a multitude<WH4393> of nations.<WH1471>

And he blessed<WH1288> them that day,<WH3117> saying,<WH559> In you shall Israel<WH3478> bless,<WH1288> saying,<WH559> God<WH430> make<WH6213> you as Ephraim<WH669> and as Manasseh:<WH4519> and he set<WH7760> Ephraim<WH669> before<WH6440> Manasseh.<WH4519>
And Israel<WH3478> said<WH559> to Joseph,<WH3130> Behold,<WH2009> I die:<WH4191> but God<WH430> shall be with you, and bring<WH7725> you again<WH7725> to the land<WH776> of your fathers.<WH1>

Moreover I have given<WH5414> to you one<WH259> portion<WH7926> above<WH5921> your brothers,<WH251> which<WH834> I took<WH3947> out of the hand<WH3027> of the Amorite<WH567> with my sword<WH2719> and with my bow.<WH7198>
